movie.name: The Dark Knight
movie.trama: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who brings chaos to Gotham City.

movie.name: Inception
movie.trama: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a chance to erase his criminal record by planting an idea into someone's mind.

movie.name: Blade Runner 2049
movie.trama: A young blade runner uncovers a secret that could plunge what's left of society into chaos.

movie.name: Interstellar
movie.trama: A team of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

movie.name: The Matrix
movie.trama: A hacker discovers the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: Inception
movies.trama: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a chance to erase his criminal record by planting an idea into someone's mind.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.trama: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who brings chaos to Gotham City.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.trama: A team of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.trama: A hacker discovers the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.trama: A former Roman general seeks revenge for the murder of his family and betrayal by the emperor's son.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.trama: A young hobbit and his companions set out to destroy a powerful ring before it falls into the wrong hands.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.trama: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in a series of violent and bizarre events.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.trama: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.trama: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who unwittingly influences several historical events.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.trama: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club as a form of male bonding.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.trama: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.trama: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a villain from conquering the world.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.trama: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.trama: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, only to learn his true destiny years later.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.trama: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.trama: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.trama: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.trama: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.name: The Green Mile
movies.trama: A tale set on death row, where a gentle giant possesses a mysterious power to heal.

movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.trama: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.name: The Prestige
movies.trama: Two rival magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate stage illusion, leading to tragic results.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.trama: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

movies.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.trama: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to flee from a tyrant who controls a water supply.

movies.name: The Departed
movies.trama: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

movies.name: The Social Network
movies.trama: The story of how Mark Zuckerberg created Facebook, and the personal and legal conflicts that followed.

movies.name: Whiplash
movies.trama: A young drummer enrolls in a competitive music conservatory, where his dreams of greatness are challenged by a demanding instructor.

movies.name: Blade Runner 2049
movies.trama: A young blade runner uncovers a secret that could plunge what's left of society into chaos.

movies.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.trama: A concierge at a famous European hotel is framed for murder, leading to an epic adventure.

movies.name: Parasite
movies.trama: A poor family schemes to infiltrate the lives of a wealthy family by posing as skilled workers.

movies.name: La La Land
movies.trama: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while struggling to make it in Hollywood.

movies.name: A Beautiful Mind
movies.trama: John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, struggles with schizophrenia while making groundbreaking contributions to his field.

movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.trama: The story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

movies.name: Shutter Island
movies.trama: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.name: The Revenant
movies.trama: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.name: The Hateful Eight
movies.trama: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

movies.name: Gone Girl
movies.trama: With his wife's disappearance becoming the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected he may not be innocent.

movies.name: The Irishman
movies.trama: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

movies.name: Jojo Rabbit
movies.trama: A young boy in Nazi Germany whose world view is upended when he discovers that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.
Two British soldiers during World War I are given a seemingly impossible mission to deliver a message that will save 1,600 men.

movies.name: Black Panther
movies.trama: T'Challa, the heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future while confronting a challenger from his country's past.

movies.name: Get Out
movies.trama: A young African-American man uncovers shocking secrets when he meets his white girlfriend's family.

movies.name: Her
movies.trama: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movies.name: The Big Short
movies.trama: In the 2000s, a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market and discover how flawed and corrupt it is.

movies.name: The King's Speech
movies.trama: The story of King George VI and his efforts to overcome his speech impediment with the help of an unorthodox speech therapist.

movies.name: Moonlight
movies.trama: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

movies.name: Gravity
movies.trama: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

movies.name: Joker
movies.trama: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

movies.name: Inglourious Basterds
movies.trama: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

movies.name: The Truman Show
movies.trama: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show.
